mapper.select:
select a.`name` as cityname,-- 城市名称 ts.id as platformid, IFNULL(ts.code,'') as storeno, ts.`name` as storename,-- 门店名称 IFNULL(tem.`name`,'') as username,-- 国安侠名称 tesr.id as deptchannelid, IFNULL(SUBSTR(tesr.role_name FROM (POSITION('_' IN tesr.role_name)+1) FOR LENGTH(tesr.role_name)),'') as deptname,-- 事业部 IFNULL(SUBSTR(tesr.role_name FROM 1 FOR (POSITION('_' IN tesr.role_name)-1)),'') AS channelname,-- 频道 IFNULL(COUNT(DISTINCT tor.id),0) AS datanum -- 分各频道总送单量 from t_order tor JOIN t_order_flow tof on tof.order_id=tor.id LEFT JOIN t_eshop tep on tep.id=tor.eshop_id LEFT JOIN t_ed_sys_role tesr on tesr.id=tep.department_id LEFT JOIN t_employee tem on tem.id=tor.employee_id LEFT JOIN t_store ts on ts.id=tor.store_id LEFT JOIN t_sys_area a on ts.city_code = a.code and a.level = 2 where tof.create_time>=#{begindate} and tof.create_time<DATE_ADD(DATE(#{enddate}), INTERVAL 1 DAY) and tof.order_status='signed' and EXISTS (select 1 from t_store where id=tor.store_id and number IN (${storeids})) and ts.`name` not like '%测试%' and tep.`name` not like '%测试%' and ts.white!='QA' and tep.white!='QA' and tep.business_model_id!='fakemodelforexpress0000000000001' GROUP BY tem.id,tep.department_id,ts.id ORDER by ts.`name`,tem.`name`
LIMIT ${limitcond}

SELECT IFNULL(SUM(datanum),0) AS sendordersum,COUNT(*) AS totalcount FROM ( select a.`name` as cityname,-- 城市名称 ts.id as platformid, ts.`name` as storename,-- 门店名称 tem.`name` as username,-- 国安侠名称 SUBSTR(tesr.role_name FROM (POSITION('_' IN tesr.role_name)+1) FOR LENGTH(tesr.role_name)) as deptname,-- 事业部 SUBSTR(tesr.role_name FROM 1 FOR (POSITION('_' IN tesr.role_name)-1)) AS channelname,-- 频道 COUNT(DISTINCT tor.id) datanum -- 分各频道总送单量 from t_order tor JOIN t_order_flow tof on tof.order_id=tor.id LEFT JOIN t_eshop tep on tep.id=tor.eshop_id LEFT JOIN t_ed_sys_role tesr on tesr.id=tep.department_id LEFT JOIN t_employee tem on tem.id=tor.employee_id LEFT JOIN t_store ts on ts.id=tor.store_id LEFT JOIN t_sys_area a on ts.city_code = a.code and a.level = 2 where tof.create_time>=#{begindate} and tof.create_time<DATE_ADD(DATE(#{enddate}), INTERVAL 1 DAY) and tof.order_status='signed' and EXISTS (select 1 from t_store where id=tor.store_id and number IN (${storeids})) and ts.`name` not like '%测试%' and tep.`name` not like '%测试%' and ts.white!='QA' and tep.white!='QA' and tep.business_model_id!='fakemodelforexpress0000000000001' GROUP BY tem.id,tep.department_id,ts.id ORDER by ts.`name`,tem.`name` ) sendorderline
